content.question: The figure above shows a Ferris wheel with radius 5 meters as Jalen, whose eye level is at point <math alttext="with coordinates 0 comma 2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow><mo>,</mo><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>, watches his friend, Ashanti, ride in one of the cars as the wheel turns. Let <math alttext="Z" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>Z</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> denote the distance from Jalen to Ashanti’s car. The diagram indicates the center of the Ferris wheel at the point <math alttext="with coordinates 12 comma 7" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>12</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>7</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> and the position of Ashanti’s car at the point <math alttext="x comma y" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>,</mo><mi>y</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>. If <math alttext="x" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="y" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> are functions of time <math alttext="t" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>, in seconds, what is the rate of change of <math alttext="Z" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>Z</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> when <math alttext="x equals 15" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>15</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>, <math alttext="y equals 11" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>11</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>, and <math alttext="the derivative of x, with respect to t, equals 1" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> ? (The equation of a circle with radius <math alttext="r" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>r</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> and center <math alttext="h comma k" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>h</mi></mrow><mo>,</mo><mi>k</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></math> is <math alttext="open parenthesis, x minus h, close parenthesis, squared, plus, open parenthesis, y minus k, close parenthesis, squared, equals r squared" overflow="scroll"><mrow><msup><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>h</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>y</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>k</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mi>r</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></math>.)

choices.label: <math alttext="the derivative of Z, with respect to t, equals, the negative of the fraction 11 over the square root of 544" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>Z</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>11</mn></mrow><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mn>544</mn></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>, so Ashanti is moving toward Jalen at a rate of approximately 0.47 meter per second.

<math alttext="the derivative of Z, with respect to t, equals, the fraction 27, over 4 times the square root of 346, end fraction" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>Z</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>27</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn><msqrt><mrow><mn>346</mn></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>, so Ashanti is moving away from Jalen at a rate of approximately 0.36 meter per second.

<math alttext="the derivative of Z, with respect to t, equals, the fraction 11 over the square root of 544" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>Z</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>11</mn></mrow><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mn>544</mn></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>, so Ashanti is moving away from Jalen at a rate of approximately 0.47 meter per second.

<math alttext="the derivative of Z, with respect to t, equals, 13.5" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>Z</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>13.5</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>, so Ashanti is moving away from Jalen at a rate of 13.5 meters per second.

content.answer: <math alttext="the derivative of Z, with respect to t, equals, the fraction 11 over the square root of 544" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>Z</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>11</mn></mrow><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mn>544</mn></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>, so Ashanti is moving away from Jalen at a rate of approximately 0.47 meter per second.

skill.text: Skill 3.F: Explain the meaning of mathematical solutions in context.
